criteria: Understanding and application of language in various contexts
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of how language functions in different contexts.
Shows minimal understanding of how language functions in different contexts; struggles to make effective choices for meaning or style.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of how language functions in some contexts but has difficulty applying this knowledge consistently.
Applies knowledge of language to understand how it functions in many contexts and makes generally effective choices for meaning and style.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of how language functions across diverse contexts; makes effective choices for meaning and style to enhance comprehension.
Exhibits a sophisticated understanding of language in various contexts, skillfully employing language to create nuanced meaning and effectively engaging the audience.
Work does not conform to any guidelines in a style manual.
Work shows minimal attempt to conform to style manual guidelines and contains numerous errors.
Work attempts to follow style manual guidelines, but contains several errors.
Work generally conforms to style manual guidelines with only a few minor errors.
Work adheres closely to style manual guidelines with only very minor inconsistencies.
Work meticulously adheres to style manual guidelines, demonstrating a mastery of the conventions appropriate for the discipline and writing type.
